context: Mid-sized retail chain evaluating comprehensive digital transformation to compete with e-commerce giants

request.purpose: Omnichannel platform implementation, mobile app development, and data analytics infrastructure
request.justification: Market share erosion to online competitors, customer experience expectations

decision_process.outcome: Identified critical gaps in mobile and data capabilities
Selected integrated omnichannel platform with 3-year payback
Successful pilot with 40% increase in digital sales

business_impact.expected_outcome: 25% increase in online sales, 15% improvement in customer satisfaction, 30% reduction in operational costs

lessons_learned: Employee training and change management critical for retail digital transformation success
